original_title: Sério Fernandes - O Mestre da Escola do Porto
overview: Forty years ago, Sério Fernandes was a television advertising director and owner of one of the most successful advertising companies in Portugal. That's when he decides to leave everything to focus on his own movies. Nowadays, Sério Fernandes is known as the master of Oporto’s school.
title: Sério Fernandes - The Master of Oporto’s School
